caption: Great food.
Pizza came late n came cold... Asked for thin crust n well done... 1 outa 2 IS Bad... Go elsewhere
Great location, always friendly fast service super clean and love the selection variety and quality
Cold and sub-pair pizza, only saving grace wld maybe be the bbq chicken heated up.
Recently moved to town, was decent pizza!
I love this place
Location😉
Nice staff,  prices are good. On the one bite up I gave the pizza app, I give the pizza a 6.5

We ordered subs with lettuce tomato and onion and Swiss cheese.when I arrived home in lake Luzerne we opened the subs up and found no lettuce no tomatoes and no onions... forget about the cheese it's the only thing that was right!!! Terrible terrible terrible!!!
Served us cold pizza today. Literally freezing. It gets worse and worse here. Used to be our favorite place but we’ll continue going to the other location from now on.
Virgil. Thwy have pizza.
In my opinion the dough is too sweet. Some people may like this but I am not a fan.
Ordered 2 specialty pizzas for Thursday at 6:00 pm , they were delivered on time and they were great.
The best pizza in town and my favorite hangout spot after a night out in town :) great staff, great vibe, and great pizza. Try the CBR, BBQ, or buffalo chicken 👌🏼
Stingy with ingredients, pizza arrived cold, size shrinks every year. Pizza 7 or Espos for me from now on!
Needs  work.

I ordered delivery online and never received my food. When it was clear they were late with the order I called them (during business hours) and they let me go to their voicemail. I had to eventually cancel through the online service in …

We LOVE it ! The staff is amazing and so sweet and kind. They saw us like we were locals! My son wanted to make a sign for his dad and they were more than helpful ! I have come here during crazy busy times and it feels the same way! The food is obviously delicious!!
The calzone was huge! Service was fast, even on an order that had to be made. Very pleased.
Best pizza in the entire upstate area period
To busy, good food. Workers need to pay attention though
Great for a late night bite to eat!

I’m so beyond glad I gave this place a shot! I felt it was incredibly fairly priced for how big it was, the sauce is fantastic, crispy crust, it was overall delicious and delivery was so quick, especially for how busy they sounded when I ordered, and it showed up still piping hot. Zero complaints and I’m excited to go back!
Best pizza down town in Saratoga

How's this place even still in business? I came in late, the lady who took my order wasn't listening, I was asking about what toppings were on a slice and she just threw it on a plate. I let that go, ordered a cheese with it. She put them …
I've been sitting here an hour and 45 minutes waiting on my delivery
They always have good pizza. Love the crust
Awesome flavor yet different

I went today for a slice and it was small and flat. 3 dollars for a slice and it was cold and horrible. I don't know what happened, this was the best pizza place in Saratoga. After 3 bites I can't get the taste of dirt out of my mouth and I'm out 3 bucks.
Amazing 🍕. I get usually a slice or three every single time I go downtown. I actually got 3 slices of chicken bacon ranch tonight and it was outstanding!!!!

Live right down the road. Cold food every time, something wrong with my order every time. Not worth the money  Update called to complain about cold and wrong food; was told they will send one(not all just one) of the correct items right …
Good pizza.  worth the price for a slice.
Its ok. Other pizza options nearby are better.

I wouldn’t even give this place one star...but I didn’t have an option for “zero stars “!  I’m a Saratoga native and used to like the pizza. Haven’t been there for a while..Just had a slice there recently, and was extremely disappointed. …
Probably went at a bad time of day, but the quality of the slices were still poor.

D'Andrea's would only be 5 stars if it was located in Chernobyl. My 4 year old niece could concoct this pie.  That being said, if you're hammered... go for it.  The blend of ragu and chef boyardee sauce will light up your drunk tastebuds. God bless.  Pizza- 2.1 Onion Rings- 3.3
They're light with their sauces and the fryer could use a cleaning.
Service is sometimes good, sometimes bad...very bad.
The best pizza I've had in years and is definitely worth the price and interaction with the workers. I would literally eat this pizza all day if it were possible. Best pizza in Saratoga period.

Well this place has gone downhill. It was always a bit funky but in a good way. The slices have gotten smaller, bathroom access was denied by the worker at the counter (although we were allowed to go behind the counter and use it on past …
Very busy late night in August. So so cracker crust pizza
Love the Pie here keep raising the prices for some reason and the dough is often too thin depending on who’s making it needs work
Great pizza fast. Needs to be cooked a little longer though. Crust underneath is still doughy. The variety and covenience are a plus.
Great pizza, awful customer service.
Sometimes has older slices
They didnt cut my pizza lol
Great crusty pizza.
Pizza had no taste. 👎 no rating but had to click on one star. Will never eat there again
They use peanut oil and tell no one! Peanut allergy beware.

The good reviewers must work for this company cause this is simply the worst pizza I have ever had in my entire life. Should have known something was up when the worker asked if I wanted my pizza heated up...like I know that pizza wasn’t …
Awesome as always.
Awesome Pizza sweet crust
It's good stuff for a quick bite
The dough is sweet and delicious
Guy behind the counter acted like we ruined his night by daring to order food.  That food left our stomachs screaming for mercy for the next 12 hours.  Better luck next time.
1 chicken bacon ranch pizza
Pizza was gross..chewy dough covered with old cheese and zero taste with less sauce..waste of money
Food is decent for the price. They do have a large selection to choose from and the staff is friendly.
It good
Amazing as always! Our families go to pizza in the Toga area!
Counter person used the same towel to clean the counter and the pizza trays

Ordered pizza here for my friends pool party, the chicken wings were covered in human hair, and after we ate the pizza everyone at the party got sick and threw up. I checked later, the chicken on the pizza was undercooked and we all …

Food was terrible. Ordered delivery through slice. Delivery was quick enough but food was horrible. Barely even could be called pizza. Used a teaspoon of sauce. Patches of just dough and no cheese. Gave wrong type of pizza also.
Sorry but the pizza is on par with frozen.
They didn't offer to heat up my Pizza when we visited. It wasn't even that late on a Saturday
Absolute garbage pizza tastes like a bad rendition of zweibeck toast
Celery rotten that paid extra for with my wings and pizza raw  I even asked for crispy , not happy ! Very disappointed!
Thank you to the Rachel and the Friday night team at d'andreas!!! Pizza was great! Service was fabulous!!! So happy to have you guys in Saratoga!
Dandreas is a great local pizza shop!

My family & I stopped in for a quick bite on our way home. Everyone wanted pizza but me so I ordered a caesar salad & the broccoli cheddar bites. The broccoli cheddar bites were very tasty & came with a sour cream mixed with salsa to dip …

Food was horrible~displayed food looked even more unappetizing.  Out if main ingredients,  mayonnaise,  vinegar,  certain breads, etc. Asked for our table to be ckeaned, maybe only 3 tables there, got wiped with a dry towel, who does that? …
It was good
Nothing fancy. But really good pizza, excellent crust, and nice service.
Disgusting, cold, soggy food and there was a hair on the pizza I ordered. Definitely will not be ordering from here again.

BEWARE PEANUT ALLERGY SUFFERERS!!  The Buffalo Chicken pizza is made with peanut butter!  They have signs posted, but if your child goes in to get a slice of pizza and doesn't take note of the sign, he/she could be in serious danger!  I …
Great pizza, great people. Little pricey though.
We love coming to D'Andrea's when we want pizza! It's a bit of a drive for us but the pizza is always delicious! The crust is the best in the area and we especially love the BBQ chicken pizza!
My favorite pizza after a late night out! Always my go to!
Ok pizza ok price
Definitely the pizza joint you gotta be fam at 10/10 get with it

I’m not sure if they’re having an off day or all these good reviewers lack tastebuds? This is simply the worst pizza I’ve ever had in my life. Our normal place is closed for renovations and my family really wanted pizza for dinner. So the …
I've lived in Brooklyn for over a year and this is still my favourite pizza place.  Love their interesting taste on the pizza dough flavour and their wings are absolutely amazing.
Just can't drive downtown without stopping in for a slice!!!!!!!!
Great service, awesome old school NY pizza, hot and fresh , we loved it
Was only in town for a few days and stumbled upon this place. Awesome pizza at a great price ;)

Awful,  always burned, ,  gave us new pizza, which was also burned,  just praying on the drunks, asked for refund said sorry, we dont  refund. Again,  just gave a 2nd shot tonight, 3/19/18 we live right around corner in down town saratoga …
The best place to go in Saratoga after a long night of drinking. Nothing better than pizza before bed after cocktails. Staff is friendly and prices are perfect! They are quick and delish!

This is my favorite pizza place in Saratoga. They have some great signature pies and their crust is somewhat sweet. They have both vegetarian and meat options and deliver within Saratoga. Tge staff are cool and friendly. Its got a hip atmosphere and they have a two slice and a drink deal for $6.50.
Crispy crust
Pizza was delicious and half price on Tuesdays. The calzone is the most underrated item on the menu.
Pritty good pizza
A must visit on Caroline street!
Didnt put my slice in the oven to warm it up from the display counter, every single pizzeria ive ever been too has done that, pizza is a 4 out of 10, would not stop again
Never have I made a food review in my life. But this pizza was so bad. I just had to.
Yummy
Sweet dough pizza perfected!
I LOVE D’s!!!!!!! The BEST pizza and great customer service!!!!!!! Especially Taylor, Kierra and Victoria!
Love the buffalo chicken and the owners. Fun place to visit
If you want a good pie, go to Pizza 7.  If you want a fricken canoli, though....  They also have Pineapple Crush!
<3 THE SAUCE
GREAT,fast excellent
Best pizza on Earth.
Great pizza and wings.
Pizza is always fantastic. Just disappointing that you have to remind the genius named Allen behind the counter to heat up the slices, that you ordered.
Easily the worst pizza I've ever had, no words exist to describe the disappointment, but the worst part is the owner, Bob, is an absolute jerk.

Not good. Crust was undercooked, I walked in and it was just weird. They all stared at me blankly like they didn't even know where they were.. ordered my slices they must have been out for a few hours and they didn't even offer to heat it …
Stop into D'Andrea's Pizza and step into old Saratoga, we were going there on high school dates and that was a long time ago. The have great pizza and apps on beautiful Caroline Street.
I can't go through town without stopping at D'Andrea's, its always fresh and clean. Super friendly staff and great pie! Its the oldest pizza shop downtown and easy parking off the busy block.
Wow this place sucks. On there website site it says one thing and when you call them they say anther thing. Ugh
Honestly the worst excuse for pizza I have ever come across. The 'crust' is terrible and undercooked. I wouldn't come back if they paid me
Chicken bacon ranch pizza, very good. Sweet crust. Best deal at 5.75 for 2 slices and a drink.
The best after a night out

Looking at reviews from other people who have it one star makes it seem like this place is horrible. That is simply not the case, D'Andreas is perhaps the best pizza in town, as a local who has lived in the town for 15 years I can say that …

Literally the worst pizza I have ever had in my life.  I gave them a second try a year later assuming the last pizza must have been a mistake, and it was equally terrible. The fact that they're the only late night pizza option in that area must be the only thing keeping them in business.
My sub was great, pizza by the slice was fine I guess. Whole pizzas are pretty good if a bit greasy. The building is a bit of a pit.

Terrible!! You can't tell me that a " pizza" place can't tell when a pizza is undercooked! Oh yeah, the Calzone also. Slimy wet dough, C'mon!  Did you ever see a pizza stretch when you took a slice from the box? Just did! Customers have …
Great pizza place in town, the foods great and the small family run feel is awesome
I walked in and got 2 slices, both were very soggy, dried sauce, and basically a big slice of dough, no flavor at all. I would suggest others to go elsewhere for a real slice of pizza.

I ordered two dozen wings, an hour later i got them. When i opened them they didn't look edible, they looked very pink and raw. Basically it looked like raw chicken smothered in hot sauce. I do not feel safe eating their food.
We ordered pizza to be delivered twice. It was overlooked and dry! It took an hour to arrive and we live 1 mile away. Won't try for a third time.
Horrible pizza, no matter how drunk you are.
Horrible pizza

I've been coming here for years, at different times. Sometimes it's for lunch, sometimes it's 2am and I need something to soak up the alcohol in my stomach. The pizza is always great, and their finders are huge. Plus, as a side note, I follow the owner, Rory, on Facebook, and his jokes are funny...usually lol. Keep up the great job!
Unique sweet pizza dough
Pizza was BURNED and owner said "have a nice day"
Fast service, open till very late, okay food. Pizza crust is okay but not great. Good drunk pizza, though.
Absolutely the worst I have ever had!!!  Wings soggy and over spicy, pizza amateurs, so gross!!!!!
They give you free extra cheese sometimes.
Food and service was fantastic
Good pizza, sort of in a bad neighborhood though
I go there alot Rory is a great guy.there pizza is heaven on a plate

Ordered a pizza and quoted 30 minutes for delivery. Cancelled after an hour and pizza was delivered 2 hrs later. Terribe customer service. Asked to be renamed and told to call back several times. One week later and still not rebated. Worst …

literally the worst pizza experience ever , ordered one pizza was quoted 30 minutes.... after an hour and half with no show/call I called to cancel the order. Not only did they not refund me. the pizza showed up an hour later. Avoid this place at all costs
The pizza it's still great, the crust is unique and on the sweet side.  The shop itself could use some renovations, it feels run-down.
Rory is awesome. The pizza is amazing and you can't go wrong. Always have fun there.
(Translated by Google) Aack ... Blahh ...  (Original) Aack... Blahh...
If I could put a zero for this place I would this is by far the worst pizza I have ever eaten made me throw up..frozen pizza tastes better then this

the pizza is decent with a lot of variety but the employees are filthy as is the store.  Do they even wash their hands?  The delivery guy has a huge head of gross kinky hair and has disgustingly hairy arms and he hovers over the slices …
Not that bad, not that good. Took forever to get here. Don't know if I'll go there again
Literally the worst pizza i ever had and i had a healthy buzz on. The box probably tasted better
my number one place to go, pizza's always great and if you catch Rory working youre likely to get a good laugh with your food.
Great delivery at 2am.  Pizza was perfect.  Brought my leftover slices home.  Yum.  Tasty, no heartburn, can't beat it.

i usually really like dandreas but ive ordered it twice now and im not happy at all!  i got the same thing both times i ordered 6-slice ex cheese with garlic bread  order #!1 the pizza was BURNT NO EX CHEESE AND THE GARLIC BREAD WAS NOT CUT …
Phenomenal pizza. The only we'd order when we lived up there. It's still our favorite after moving to many states and having many different pizzas.
The pizza is good, and during the day traffic is regular, giving it that nice friendly atmosphere. Can not say for when the night life is going on, but it's worth the good price and pizza.
the phone # is wrong. This is the phone # for Team Creative Connections, LLC

D'Andrea's pizza has an unusual, slightly sweet crust which you'll either love or hate. It's best right out of the oven, worst on a cold pizza that has sat around for awhile. They usually have a nice selection of slices already prepared and …
Owner is incredibly rude to customers. Pizza is terrible. Definitely a bad experience.

Terrible customer service, no accountability for orders. Placed an order and was told 30 minutes. 1 hour passes, call up and I am told that the delivery person left 7 minutes ago. 1 hour and 15 minutes has now passed, so I call again. I am …

HORRIBLE!!!! I ordered food through the online ordering option and hour and a half later I called and was assured my order was on the way. 20 minutes later I called to ask what was going on and for a refund and I was told I had to call the …

THE WORST PIZZA I EVER HAD!! I think they made it in their betty crocker oven. Ordered delivery......mozz sticks gross and cold. They had the old oil taste. The pizza was worse than slop at a soup kitchen. Dont waste your time.

The pizza is very sweet, but very tasty (especially the barbecue chicken). This modest little shack is not a place to go with a family to eat out, but it's a great place to get some pizza while downtown or for pick up.
One of the best pizza joints in Saratoga.  Perfect for a late night slice when downtown.  Also delivers VERY far away.
Pizza wasn't great but better then good same with wings. even good cold...AMT
